data.title: Doubles Team Champions in Professional Tennis
data.text:
Born three minutes apart, Bob and Mike have been in sync ever since, on and off the court.

Their success is the result of a combination of hard work, mutual respect, and passion for tennis.

Bob’s ID

Current Davis Cup captain

Bob won the U.S. Mixed Doubles Championship 4 times with Katarina Srebotnik (2003), Vera Zvonareva (2004), Martina Navratilova (2006) and Liezel Huber (2010). He won the French Open Mixed Doubles Championship twice with Victoria Azarenka (2008) and Liezel Huber (2009)

Height: 6'4" (193 cm)

Weight: 192 lbs (87 kg)

Plays: Left-Handed

Partnered with Liezel Huber to win 2010 US Open Mixed Doubles Title

Partnered with Martina Navratilova to win her final Grand Slam, 2006 US Open Mixed Doubles Championship

Mike’s ID

Current Davis Cup doubles coach

In Bob's absence, who spent time recuperating from hip surgery, Mike won two Men's Doubles Grand Slams: he won Wimbledon and the U.S. Open in 2018 with Jack Sock

Mike has also won four Mixed Doubles Championships. With Lisa Raymond, he won the U.S. Open in 2002, the French open in 2003, and Wimbledon in 2012. He also won the French Open with Betthanie Mattek-Sands in 2015

Height: 6'3" (190 cm)

Weight: 192 lbs (87 kg)

Plays: Right-Handed

Partnered with Bethanie Mattek-Sands to win 2015 French Open Mixed Doubles Title

Partnered with Lisa Raymond to win 2012 Wimbledon Mixed Doubles Title

Personal

Age: 45 (04.29.1978)

Birthplace: Camarillo, California, USA

Residence:

Hallandale, Florida, USA (Bob)

Wesley Chapel, Florida, USA (Mike)

Turned Pro: 1998

Shoes: K-SWISS

Racquet: Blackout 300 XTD by Solinco

String: Hyper-G by Solinco
